entry.title: Most Used Hanzis
entry.content:
Language learning : Minimize the amount of learning you need to read a text !

I’m lazy… someone said Good developers are lazy (because you’ll develop things to make other things happen automatically). I think it could be applied to language learning.

I’m learning chinese. Which is one of the worst languages to pick if you’re not chinese. 2200 hours of learning, when italian or english would require 600 hours !

So, in order to read texts in Chinese without learning all the characters ＊(汉字 － hanzi ： character)＊, I wanted to know which characters appeared the most in a given text, learn them and get most of the text for a minimal amount of work.

I then developed this small javascript script (which has the side effect of improving my feeble JS skills) :

See the Pen Get the most used characters in a text by Pierre (@Marekje) on CodePen.

How-to : Change the text inside the “text” tags, and automagically see which characters occurs most often.
